title: cGMP Practical Competency Enhancement Course Using Blended Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of the pharmaceutical/biotech field or relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Requires content structured for smartphone-based learning, with assessment designs centered on practical application.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret cGMP core regulations (21 CFR Part 11, EU GMP Annex 11) and apply them to practical scenarios.
Learners can accurately identify over 80% of risk factors in cGMP documents using signaling techniques.
Learners can analyze GMP violation cases and propose improvement measures using multimedia resources (videos, infographics).
Learners achieve a score of 75 or higher (out of 100) in the comprehensive final evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
